name: Carrot Bell Pepper Omelette
description: This Carrot Bell Pepper Omelette is a perfect addition to your collection of healthy recipes. Not only is it low-carb, but it's also packed with nutritious ingredients like shredded carrots and green bell pepper, making it an ideal choice for anyone looking to maintain a healthy lifestyle.

recipeInstructions.text: Begin by whisking 3 large eggs in a bowl until well combined.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Finely dice the 0.50 green bell pepper and add it to the eggs.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Shred 1 cup of carrots and mix them into the egg and bell pepper mixture.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Stir in 0.25 cups of grated Parmesan cheese into the mixture.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a non-stick skillet over medium heat and pour in the omelette mixture, spreading it evenly across the skillet. Let it cook for 3 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: Gently flip the omelette and cook for an additional 2 minutes, or until the eggs are fully set.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6

recipeInstructions.text: Serve the omelette warm, optionally garnished with fresh herbs or avocado slices.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 7
